>>>>> "Vincent" == Vincent D Murphy <vdm@...> writes:

    Vincent> The point though, is that this thing is completely
    Vincent> RESTful.  The browser manages all the state on the
    Vincent> client-side, so you don't need to use cookies (for the
    Vincent> shopping cart).

Just checked: removing the cookies empties your shopping cart...
